description:
Work up a sweat in the tracks, knowing your sweater is working to keep you dry and fresh. The secret is the unique and technical fibre, created from coconut husks, that resists moisture, odour, and provides UV protection. This true multisport midlayer is great for high-output training on cold days.

  • Fabric made with activated charcoal from coconut husks, with a high proportion of spandex for comfortable stretch
  • Charcoal yarns are natrually odour resistant
  • Stand up collar and half-length zipper provide coverage options
  • Flat lock seams throughout for chafe-free wear
name: Swix Tista Half Zip Midlayer - Men's
